mapper.select: SELECT c.customerId, c.customerName,c.customerUserId,(SELECT u.realname FROM `user` u WHERE u.uid=c.customerUserId) AS customerUserName,c.customerCreateId,c.customerSourse, (SELECT d.dictItemName FROM dict d WHERE d.dictType = '002' AND d.dictItemCode=c.customerSourse) AS customerSourseDict,c.customerIndustry, (SELECT d.dictItemName FROM dict d WHERE d.dictType = '001' AND d.dictItemCode=c.customerIndustry) AS customerIndustryDict,c.customerPhone,c.customerAddress, c.customerDate FROM customer c
